q: Barbara Bush at a Feb. 3, 2003 National Security Council meeting in which Colin Powell sketched out the presentation he was to make at the U.N. two days later. Rumsfeld quotes himself as having told the meeting, We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that Colin Powell will talk about it. Khurmal is the name of a village near the site.
